mapper.insert: insert ignore into sys_message (type, sub_order_id, saler_id, buyer_id, commodity_id, commodity_name, price, num, address,`status`) values (#{subOrder.status},#{subOrder.subOrderId},#{subOrder.salerId},#{subOrder.buyerId},#{subOrder.commodityId}, #{subOrder.commodityName},#{subOrder.price},#{subOrder.num},#{subOrder.address},1)
